code: protected Endpoint createEndpoint(String uri, String remaining, Map<String, Object> parameters) throws Exception {     DirectEndpoint endpoint = new DirectEndpoint(uri, this, consumers).     endpoint.setBlock(block).     endpoint.setTimeout(timeout).     setProperties(endpoint, parameters).     return endpoint. }
@Override protected void doStop() throws Exception {     ServiceHelper.stopService(consumers).     consumers.clear().     super.doStop(). }

comment: /**  * If sending a message to a direct endpoint which has no active consumer,  * then we can tell the producer to block and wait for the consumer to become active.  */
code: /**  * If sending a message to a direct endpoint which has no active consumer,  * then we can tell the producer to block and wait for the consumer to become active.  */ public void setBlock(boolean block) {     this.block = block. }

comment: /**  * The timeout value to use if block is enabled.  */
code: /**  * The timeout value to use if block is enabled.  */ public void setTimeout(long timeout) {     this.timeout = timeout. }
